== Arangottukara (627717) ==

Arangottukara is a village in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 329 hectares and harbouring 682 households with total population of 3013 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Shoranur]] is at a distance of 11 km. Male population is 1447 and female population is 1566. Scheduled Caste Population is 610 and Scheduled Tribes population is 1. Census Location Code of the village is 627717<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
